title: The De’Aundre Bonds Interview: Snowfall, 50 Cent Dissing Him, Manslaughter Charge & More
description:
De’Aundre Bonds shares with us about his long-lasting career, landing role on Snowfall, doing time, and more.

-----
00:00 Intro
8:27 - His faith never wavering, being sh*t 3 times, doing 12yrs in prison
10:48 - Becoming a man as a child, providing for his family, selling candy, pump gas   
13:17 - What it took to get girls back in the day vs now, asking for Rylee's spliff! 
20:30 - Trying to sell candy to a talent agent, auditioning an IHOP commercial for her, and killing it 
24:02 - Trying to sell Tupac candy, trying to rap for him, telling him “F**k you then!” after being rejected 
46:25 - Not associating with a lot of what was going on in prison, staying in tune with his future 
47:32 - Not being worried about booking roles after getting out, knowing who he is 
48:55 - The first week out of prison, things moving fast, being on parole for 3yrs 
50:55 - Filming video the first day out of prison, social media’s influence on celebrity 
53:48 - Hearing about Snowfall while locked up, being friends with the late John Singleton
56:20 - 50 Cent is one of the greatest artists, businessmen, and entertainers of all time 
1:00:20 - Doing another 18 months for carrying a kitchen knife 

-----
